name: Sort columns for Leave Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Sort columns for Leave Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
Then Sort "Period,Type,Reason,Remarks" columns and verify sorting
